welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fox Lake, a charming city known for its beautiful lake views and tranquil atmosphere. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and enjoy all that it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport provides a luxurious and convenient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
